entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of drizzle. Low minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of drizzle this evening then 30 percent chance of snow overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Fog patches developing near midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 6:53 PM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers in the morning and early in the afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. High plus 3. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:53 PM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023
